name: AGX Coin
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en:
AGX Coins are stablecoins backed by one gram of silver. They are redeemable for physical silver on request, in increments of 100 troy ounces (larger bars are available on request). 

AGX Coins are legally considered pickup slips or warehouse receipts for physical metal and, as such, are considered utility tokens in most jurisdictions.
